title: nAgarAjanAna
sahitya:
nAgarAjanAna shESa shayanA nArAyaNa emmai ANDaruL melliya


anupallavi

  rAga rAjanAna tODiyilanadu eTTezhuttai vaittup-pADa virumbinEn


caraNam    OmkAra nAdam unadu tiru sangattilO kaDal tarangattilO vengala
maNi OsaiyilO bhakta kOTigaLin jaya jaya ghOSattilO muzhangudE
narasimha mUrttiyAi hiraNiyan viral ashaiyum dishaiyelAm niraindu ninrari hariyena meyyurugi bhajikkum prahlAdanaip-pAlanai puriya vanda
